string-array.name: help_content
string-array.item: Spam messages intelligence block. Or automatically block messages and calls according to customed rules.
Lock the lost mobile and immediately send SMS to a safe number set by you after SIM card replaced. In additional, remote wipe personal information such as contacts, SMS and call logs.
Free online backup and encrypted storage your personal information and application list to cloud server. You can restore all the information to a new mobile if needed.
Timely, precisely scan and kill all viruses with one click.

Real-time monitor to each process, showing 3G/2G charge network traffic and WIFI network traffic separately. Clearly display every day/ month used and remain traffic data. Set remind function when a set traffic limitation reached.

Check application amount, version, size and authority information. Quick uninstall of any application. APK management enable fast scan, install and delete operation to those already existed APK packages.
Quick check and manage operating software processes and service processes; end selected or all processes to release memory in order to fasten mobile speed.
Statistical power and time consuming rate of each process; order according to power consumption ratio.
Clean the cache brought by application running. Quick scan the applications with cache and click “clean” to release more memory through clear application, file, search and browser cache
Scan all the applications start at boot, forbid those unnecessary ones to accelerate booting time. One click on optimize to automatically adjust start at boot applications makes booting time faster.

Inspect mobile system condition in an all-round way, once click on optimize, those items need to be optimized would form into a list with a system score and a detailed system report. Self-exam eliminates the potential risks easily and quickly.

Firewall is to limit network access of installed applications. Turn on or turn off 3G/ WIFI network access of the applications. Make your mobile network traffic under proper control. Precondition is mobile has rooted.

string-array.name: intercept_mode_desp
string-array.item: Accept white list and contacts; block black list and the keywords; do not block calls from strangers
Only accept SMS and calls from contacts, block others
Only accept SMS and calls from white list
Close block function, accept all SMS and calls
Caution! Block all SMS and calls!
